about_the_game:
Included FREE with the Aliens: Fireteam Elite DELUXE EDITION or available for individual purchase.

Customize your Aliens: Fireteam Elite experience with the following items for your marine:
- 7 Mk.57 Compression Suit Kit Skins (Available for: Demolisher, Doc, Gunner, Lancer, Phalanx, Recon, and Technician Kits)
- 7 Marine Utility Jumpsuit Kit Skins (Available for: Demolisher, Doc, Gunner, Lancer, Phalanx, Recon, and Technician Kits)
- Mk.57 Compression Helmet Head Accessory
- Bucket Hat Head Accessory
- Tactical Helmet Head Accessory
- Anti-Glare Goggles Head Accessory
- Aurora Animated Weapon Color
- Crucible Steel Weapon Color
- Polarized Blue Weapon Color
- Polarized Red Weapon Color
- Polarized Green Weapon Color
- Topographic Shoal Weapon Color
- Topographic Plains Weapon Color
- Topographic Jungle Weapon Color
- Digital Static Weapon Decal
- Heartbeat Weapon Decal
- Ace of Spades Weapon Decal
- Seek & Destroy Weapon Decal
- Air Drums Emote
- Check the Area Emote
- This One is Mine Emote
- Vomit Emote
- 3 Random Challenge Cards, 3 Random Consumables
- Bonus bundle of Requisition Credits and Rep Scrip

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

package_groups.title: Buy Aliens: Fireteam Elite - UACM Frontline Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Athlon X4 950 / Intel i5-2500K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 285 4GB / Nvidia GTX 760 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: See base game for full requirements
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600AF / Intel i5-7400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 480 8GB / Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated Direct X 11 compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: See base game for full requirements

short_description: Advance to the frontlines with the latest in combat technologies. Prepare for tomorrow's battlegrounds with the UACM Frontline Pack - over 25 items including class kit skins, weapon colors, head accessories, emotes and more!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Czech, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
